meanings.sent1: She was louring at him after he broke her favorite toy.
meanings.sent2: The teacher loured at the students who were misbehaving in class.
meanings.sent3: Despite her louring expression, she couldn't hide her excitement for the surprise party.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds loured overhead, threatening to unleash their fury.
meanings.sent5: His louring gaze made everyone in the room feel uneasy.

meanings.sent1: The louring sky signaled an approaching thunderstorm.
meanings.sent2: The old abandoned house had a louring presence on the hill.
meanings.sent3: The forest became louring as the sun started to set, casting long shadows.
meanings.sent4: The alleyway had a louring atmosphere, making her walk faster to get out.
meanings.sent5: The castle stood louring on the cliff, overlooking the turbulent sea below.
